name: OptionsTest
description: Unit tests for the Options class, focusing on various methods like option, subset, and nextElement.

test_cases.name: testOptionWithArray
test_cases.description: Tests the option method with an array of strings.

test_cases.name: testOptionWithVarargsString
test_cases.description: Tests the option method with varargs of strings.

test_cases.name: testOptionWithVarargs
test_cases.description: Tests the option method with various types of varargs and arrays.

test_cases.name: testSubset
test_cases.description: Tests the subset method with various types of arrays.

test_cases.name: testSubsetWithDuplicate
test_cases.description: Tests the subset method with arrays containing duplicates.

test_cases.name: testEmptySubset
test_cases.description: Tests the subset method with an empty subset and negative size.

test_cases.name: testOptionWithEnum
test_cases.description: Tests the option method with an enum type.

test_cases.name: testNextArrayElement
test_cases.description: Tests the nextElement method with an array of integers.

test_cases.name: testNextListElement
test_cases.description: Tests the nextElement method with a list of integers.
